ai-kv17.3:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv17.3:1.7_0: This being so, because of past in the future:
ai-kv17.3:1.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv17.3:1.11_0: It is all a deed done by all deeds.
ai-kv17.3:1.12_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv17.3:2.1_0: It is all a deed done by all deeds.
ai-kv17.3:2.3_0: Should kill living creatures with the intention of eating:
ai-kv17.3:2.5_0: Killing living creatures is a fruit of killing.
ai-kv17.3:2.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv17.3:2.11_0: Killing, too, the fruit of killing is (such as) the fruit.
ai-kv17.3:2.12_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv17.3:3.1_0: With the intention to commit theft, they take the deed. ...
ai-kv17.3:3.8_0: with one sitting next to the house,
ai-kv17.3:3.13_0: giving a gift to the deed,
ai-kv17.3:3.17_0: if she gives the requisite of medicine for support when sick;
ai-kv17.3:3.19_0: the requisite of medicine as cure for the sick.
ai-kv17.3:3.22_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv17.3:3.25_0: the requisite of medicine for support when sick;
ai-kv17.3:3.26_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv17.3:5.3_0: sentient beings are bound by deeds,
ai-kv17.3:5.4_0: are like a moving chariot’s linchpin.
ai-kv17.3:6.2_0: Knowing this deed was done, killing,
ai-kv17.3:6.3_0: Knowing that deed is a difference between them,
ai-kv17.3:6.4_0: why do you say there’s no deed?”
ai-kv17.3:7.3_0: for this is said: “This is workable.”
ai-kv17.3:7.4_0: The discussion on all this is finished.
